title: Oceanic skin the Long forgotten dream
body:
Hey riot was just wondering if you had any more news and/or updates for us on the long(very very long) awaited Oce server skin?

Last we heard was back in this thread http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=73666&highlight=oceanic+skin 
and you where saying that you had some concepts but nothing solid so in the couple of months since then do you have anything more solid?

Like maybe a couple of concepts that you could get people to vote for or even a little bit of concept art?

im adding a poll so people can vote to see if they want the skin to be australian themed since thats the server base or if they want a more multi cultural theme

please if you have any info for us, even a small little response would be appreciated.

Predator Juice

p.s if anyone would care to post in some suggestions or artwork of skin themes feel free


Edit 1: yes i am aware that NZ exists as i stated though the poll had Australia as that is where the server is located.

Edit 2: sweet we had a red post

replies.body: You do know New Zealand exists too
Yes but we don't want a sheep skin...
but little lamb amumu would be adorable

Even if most of the people vote for the skin to be Australian themed (like outback renekton), it would be culturally unviable for Riot to design a skin for OCE soley based on Australia. OCE is not just australia.

This is true!

@OP we haven't forgotten about this. I know we keep saying that but its because its true. I can't share any more info than that unfortunately... For nao ;)
Its nice to have received a response about this from a red so soon i'm happy that it is still being looked into any little hints you might be able to tease us

> [{quoted}](name=Tomblade,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rgqMjIWV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-24T02:12:47.950+0000)
>
> This is true!
> 
> @OP we haven't forgotten about this. I know we keep saying that but its because its true. I can't share any more info than that unfortunately... For nao ;)

IS it gonna be Soon™?

Someone pointed this out on reddit

Is this possibly a Maokai skin? Not only does Maokai say "I do your bidding...for now" but you also spelled now, nao, similar to how your spell Mao.

> [{quoted}](name=Trinity Force,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rgqMjIWV,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-01-24T09:08:12.671+0000)
>
> Is this possibly a Maokai skin? Not only does Maokai say "I do your bidding...for now" but you also spelled now, nao, similar to how your spell Mao.

Don't do this to me... Please... I don't want to raise my expectations...

It may be true but you guys have had plenty of opportunity to come up with something, coming up on two years if I'm not mistaken. You've tried to accommodate the entirety of OCE in one skin but where has that got you? I think it's time you cut your losses and just get *something* done.

Not necessarily, you make a skin that would appeal to the larger Oce population thus making higher buy rate.
Australia has the largest pop in League in Oce so id assume it would more than likely Australia.
Tho i think it should be slighty Hinting as an Aus skin and not Blantantly Stereotypical.
just my 2cent blurb
Are there any Champions that you have ideas for like maybe Crocodile hunter fizz or Guntree Mao'kai (he could chuck koalas)

It should be multi-cultural or, as HellStrikerZ said, some common theme of OCE but, at this point, anything will do. I don't care whether Riot go Aussie, NZ, PNG, etc. At this stage I don't care what it is as long as it's got something to do with OCE.

coral zyra.
it's zyra
but blue.

Alright, here's the list of countries presents in Oceania: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_sovereign_states_and_dependent_territories_in_Oceania

Even though, Riot in Australia doesn't accommodate all of them due to network constraint, Oceania have common themes that can be used for the skin which are island, beach, reef, waves.  

I'm myself from French Polynesia but currently living in Australia and I'm certain there are some people playing in OCE from French Polynesia.
